title: [Sci-Fi] Space Opera Music
description: [Sci-Fi] Space Opera Music contains 17 minutes of various music for science fiction setting.
longDescription:
Demo: https://soundcloud.com/draco-nared/sets/scifi-space-opera-music

[Sci-Fi] Space Opera Music' was composed for science fiction setting, especially with space opera genre in mind. The tracks were created to suit various moments in gameplay like stealth mission behind enemy lines, fighting waves of aliens or walking through unexplored worlds. In each folder you can find many base tracks which were designed to be interchangable with each other. It means that you can play them in whatever order you would like to. However, some pairs might not play well, that's why there are variants with suggested order. What's more, all tracks (even the variants) are loopable.

Tracks included:
Dark Nebula Eye (7 base tracks, 3 variants)
Dead Planet (9 base tracks, 6 variants)
Event Horizon (9 base tracks, 3 variants)
Blood Quazar (7 base tracks, 3 variants)
Moon's Shadow (7 base tracks, 3 variants)
Dream Of Supergiant (8 base tracks, 4 variants)
